name: A Winter Night Wonder
description:
Entry for the Sgap General Art Project

Reccomended to play through more than once. There are 6 stars in total to collect, if you get stuck with the last one please comment and I'll reply with how to get it.

Controls

Space: select from menu
Escape: Exit game
Arrow keys / wasd: move

Credits Design

spookyG
WaKa

Contributions from GoatKid and char

Art

WaKa

Music

char
spookyG

Programming

spookyG

Using the font Vidaloka
Game made with unity & sfxr
